cmds.cmd: liblist -a qrpglesrc 2> /dev/null; liblist -a QGPL 2> /dev/null; cl -v "CRTBNDRPG PGM("'qrpglesrc/heart'") SRCSTMF('"'src/QRPGLESRC/heart.rpgle.pgm'"') DBGVIEW(*ALL) REPLACE(*YES) TGTCCSID(*JOB) "
